'''
    This file generates response templates for different requests made by the frontend
'''
import pydantic as Pydantic
from pydantic import EmailStr, Field
from datetime import datetime


class _EmployeeBase( Pydantic.BaseModel ):
    email: EmailStr
    first_name: str = Field( min_length=1, max_length=128 )
    last_name: str = Field( min_length=1, max_length=128 ) 
    

[docs]class EmployeeCreate( _EmployeeBase ):
    hashed_password: str = Field( min_length=1, max_length=512 )


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True



[docs]class Employee( _EmployeeBase ):
    id: int = Field( ge=0 )
    role: int = Field( ge=0 )


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True


class _SupervisorBase( Pydantic.BaseModel ):
    employee_id: int = Field( ge=0 )


[docs]class SupervisorCreate( _SupervisorBase ):
    pass



[docs]class Supervisor( _SupervisorBase ):
    id: int = Field( ge=0 )
    date_created: datetime
    first_name: str = Field( min_length=1, max_length=128 )
    last_name: str = Field( min_length=1, max_length=128 )
    email: EmailStr


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True


class _SprintBase( Pydantic.BaseModel ):
    sprint_name: str = Field( max_length=512 )


[docs]class SprintCreate( _SprintBase ):
    pass



[docs]class Sprint( _SprintBase ):
    sprint_id: int = Field( ge=0 )
    start_date: datetime
    # end_date: datetime
    employee_id: int = Field( ge=0 )


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True


class _TaskBase( Pydantic.BaseModel ):
    task_name: str = Field( max_length=512 )
    task_info: str = Field( max_length=1028 )
    # sprint_id: int = Field( ge=0 )


[docs]class TaskCreate( _TaskBase ):
    pass



[docs]class Task( _TaskBase ): 
    task_id: int = Field( ge=0 )
    is_complete: int = Field( gt=-1, lt=2 )


[docs]    class Config:
        orm_mode = True
